page.title: 05RAILWAY EASTLEIGH
page.content: Eastleigh is a town founded for the Railway development in the area. For many years it was the sole large employer in the area.Recently,due to cut backs,the land and works once used by them has been put to other uses, mainly small industry. Eastleigh is still a major railway junction between the London to Bournemouth line and the Salisbury to Portsmouth line.It supports a thriving Engineering works and a large marshalling yard.A lot of the track laying work for the Hampshire area is centred here and the Ford Motor Company use the yards for moving there production of Transit vans and Mini buses.
